title: My 3 day IP boost hasn't been working on 3rd day! halp
body: Hey, so my 3 day IP boost hasn't been working on the 3rd day, i bought it wednesday the 26th, hope this is the correct section to post it's been years since i had an IP boost problem and this is all new to me again. i'm also joined in a full club and still gaining 150 per win 130 per loss...so the losses are boosted? any links to proper channels would be awesome

replies.body: Looking into this for you, I do see that you still have an IP boost that's active, so you should be getting credit.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can give you some more specifics and help out individually.  We can break down the bonuses you're getting per game, if it offers any relief!  We'll reply as soon as we can.
